item.title: Clue scroll problem
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

if was thinking of making the clue scrolls work but i got already one problem…
Ok started with this code! but i compiled it no errors but when i press read it dont open :S
Case:

case 2678: clue(); break;

Public void:

public void clue() { sendQuest("A Note from a stranger", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Objective:@blu@Dig", 8147); sendQuest("Clue:@blu@ 3 places to north", 8148); sendQuest("@blu@9 places to east and 1 to south", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("Objective 2:@blu@Find a note in a chest", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("@gre@ Can't read the next objective", 8153); sendQuest("@gre@ Maybe i need to read the other note", 8154); flushOutStream(); }

Question: What did i do wrong?
Question: Can you help me fix this?
Question: Where do i need to place the case this is first time i work on delta server

Problem: The Case is on the wrong place,

Say: Thanks for reading hope you can help me

Read full topic
